special_text:
[+2]: Create a 2/2 colorless Soldier artifact creature token with “When this creature dies, each opponent discards a card.”
[-3]: [b][Each player sacrifices two creatures.][/b]
[-8]: Each opponent sacrifices six permanents, loses 6 life and discards six cards. you gain 6 life and may put up to six permanents from any graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
Flash paradigm {2}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its paradigm cost.)[/i]
